Uses of Crossover in ga.crossover
 

Classes in ga.crossover that implement Crossover
 class NoneCrossover
          Added to allow the None menu selection, does not perform any crossing of parents.
 class SinglePointCrossover
          An implementation of single point crossover, a single loci is found on both chromosomes and their tails are swapped.
